title: Slovenia Asylum Applications
description: Asylum Applications in Slovenia decreased to 485 persons in September from 640 persons in August of 2022. Asylum Applications in Slovenia averaged 143.16 persons from 2008 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 740 persons in September of 2021 and a record low of 0 persons in October of 2009. Asylum Application in this page refers to first time asylum applicants. Data is supplied to Trading Economics by the Eurostat, National Ministries of Interior and other official agencies.
author: EUROSTAT
